name: Cellular
description:
Hey all, this is my submission to PROCJAM '16. I had a lot of fun making this and in general participating.

It started out as a way to generate roads and cities on terrain, but I really liked how it looked so kept going where it took me. It's not really a game, there's no goal. You can just sit back and watch the cells interact. You can interact with the process a bit using the mouse, if you wish.

If this interests you, you can follow my twitter @bugshake, enjoy!
